The given paragraph does not contain any other chemical entities. The identified entity is "S - A block," which is a type of heart block. It is important to note that "S-A block" is not a chemical substance but rather a cardiac condition characterized by a disruption in the electrical conduction system of the heart.

The given paragraph contains only one entity that can be considered a chemical entity, which is "S - A block." It is important to note that "S-A block" is not a chemical substance but rather a cardiac condition characterized by a disruption in the electrical conduction system of the heart. However, it is sometimes described as a type of "blockade" or "inhibition" of electrical conduction, which can be considered a chemical or biochemical process. Therefore, it can be argued that "S-A block" is a valid chemical entity in this context.
